mapper.select: /* 권한 정보(1개) view org/ezdevgroup/common/persist/acl/auth/AuthMapper.xml */ SELECT AUTH_CD AS authCd , AUTH_NM AS authNm , AUTH_DC AS authDc , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(REG_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(MODI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modiDt FROM ACL_AUTH WHERE AUTH_CD = #{authCd}
